Oct. 4, 2003 D West Wales BBA Festival Contest (First Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-first-section
None
Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Steve Jones—Horn, Ammanford. Prizes - 1st £120, 2nd £80, 3rd £60. 3 bands competed.
Aug. 12, 2015, 1:12 a.m. July 3, 2020, 9:54 p.m.

2 Rogerstone Band Ceri Thomas
